task_background: Prepare the abandoned NexusCore office for a potential investor visit by organizing, cleaning, and repairing key items.

tasks.task_description: Place the prototype VR headset (vr_headset_1) on modular_desk_2.
Place the motivational poster (motivational_poster_1) on the whiteboard (whiteboard_1).
Find the heaviest, white modular desk and open it.
Find the only Dell monitor that is on modular_desk_7 and turn it on.
Use the scissors (scissors_1) to unwrap the mail stack (mail_stack_1).
Use the document scanner (document_scanner_1) to scan the handwritten note (handwritten_note_1) and then place it in the locked filing cabinet (locked_filing_cabinet_1).
Find the only green-stickered prototype circuit board (prototype_circuit_board_5), use the barcode scanner (barcode_scanner_1) to scan it, and then place it on the executive desk (executive_desk_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the locked safe (safe_1) in the founder's office.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to turn on the flickering LED panel (led_panel_1) in the server room.
Move the conference table (conference_table_1) to the storage closet (storage_closet).
Move the server rack (server_rack_1) to the main workspace (main_workspace).

Cooperatively move the oak executive desk (executive_desk_1) to the main workspace (main_workspace) and then use the heating element (heating_element_1) to melt the whiskey in the Macallan 12 bottle (whiskey_bottle_1).
Cooperatively move the water cooler (water_cooler_1) to the break room (break_room) and then use the sterilizer (sterilizer_1) to clean it.
